title: Combining policies and issuing binders to meet requirements
context: ยง287-32 Combining policies and issuing binders to meet requirements. The requirements for a motor vehicle liability policy may be fulfilled by the policies of one or more insurance carriers which policies together meet such requirements. Any binder issued pending the issuance of a motor vehicle liability policy shall be deemed to fulfill the requirements for such a policy. [L 1949, c 393, pt of ยง1; RL 1955, ยง160-110; HRS ยง287-32]
